code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}}}%% sequenceDiagram participant User participant Vault as YieldVaultMultiAsset
(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) participant Aave as Aave V3 Pool
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) participant RSC as YieldOptimizerRsc
(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) participant Callback as Callback Proxy
(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) Note over User,Callback: Yield Monitoring and Rebalancing Flow User->>Vault: triggerYieldSnapshot(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) Vault->>Aave: getReserveData(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) Aave-->>Vault: liquidityRate, APY data Vault->>Vault: Calculate APYs for all assets Vault-->>RSC: emit YieldSnapshot(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) Note over RSC: RSC analyzes yield data RSC->>RSC: Compare APYs across assets RSC->>RSC: Determine optimal allocation alt Yield difference exceeds threshold RSC->>Callback: emit Callback(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) Callback->>Vault: executeRebalance(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) Vault->>Vault: Update asset allocations Vault-->>User: Funds rebalanced to higher yield else Yield difference below threshold Note over RSC: No rebalance needed end
